column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I ca n't believe this is all for me . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " I 'm not sure what Tarrlok 's plotting , but keep your guard up .
#Text=If you 'd excuse us , the city awaits its hero .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Meelo !
#Text=No , that 's not a toilet !
#Text=Oh dear .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Korra , it 's my pleasure to introduce Republic City 's most famous industrialist , Hiroshi Sato .
#Text=" Korra says : " Nice to meet you .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " We 're all expecting great things from you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Right , greatness .
#Text=" Mako says : " Hey , Korra !
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " This is my daughter , Asami .
#Text=" Asami says : " It 's lovely to meet you .
#Text=Mako 's told me so much about you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Really ?
#Text=Because he has n't mentioned you at all .
#Text=How did you two meet ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Asami crashed into him on her moped .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=Are you okay ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm fine .
#Text=More than fine .
#Text=Mister Sato agreed to sponsor our team ; we 're back in the tournament !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hehe , is n't that great ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , terrific .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Chief Beifong , I believe you and Avatar Korra have already met .
#Text=" Lin Beifong says : " Just because the city 's throwing you this big to - do , do n't think you 're something special .
#Text=You 've done absolutely nothing to deserve this .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " If you 'd be so kind , they just have a couple of questions .
#Text=" Korra says : " But ... " Reporter # 1 says : " Avatar Korra , you witnessed Amon take away people 's bending firsthand .
#Text=How serious a threat does he pose to the innocent citizens of Republic City ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I think he presents a real problem .
#Text=" Reporter # 2 says : " Then why have you refused to join Tarrlok 's task force ?
#Text=As the Avatar , should n't you be going after Amon ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , I ... " Reporter # 2 says : " Why are you backing away from this fight ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=No !
#Text=I 've never backed away from anything in my life !
#Text=" Reporter # 3 says : " You promised to serve this city , are n't you going back on that promise now ?
#Text=" Reporter # 4 says : " Do you think pro-bending is more important than fighting the revolution ?
#Text=" Reporter # 5 says : " How do you think Avatar Aang would have handled this ?
#Text=" Reporter # 2 says : " Are you afraid of Amon ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I am not afraid of anybody !
#Text=If the city needs me then ... I 'll join Tarrlok 's task force and help fight Amon .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " There 's your headline , folks .
#Text="
